events.message: We received John Doe's application for the software engineer position. His resume highlights multiple years of experience in backend development with Python and AWS.
John Doe's application has been classified under the Engineering cluster based on his skills in software development and devops.
Recruiter Sarah Lee has been assigned to manage John Doe's case and to coordinate the upcoming screening and interviews.
The initial screening call with John Doe went well, confirming his technical knowledge and cultural fit for the engineering team.
John Doe responded quickly and enthusiastically accepted our request to schedule the technical interview next week.
The technical interview with John Doe has been scheduled for May 15th at 10:00 AM UTC with the senior engineering panel.
